job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - 100% Remote
job.description:
Title: Full Stack Software EngineerLocation: 100% RemoteFull time/Direct Hire   What We're Looking ForWe are looking for someone who takes pride in the craft and wants to be part of a team of talented engineers working to further Till's growth. You'll partner with engineering teams, product managers, analysts, and customer success to design, build, and maintain our technology platform.   Responsibilities  - Own one or multiple projects from start to finish and be guided by the support of a dedicated manager, mentor or lead engineer   
  - Participate in daily team processes and learn all aspects of the software development lifecycle   
  - Track data that will allow us to better understand how we can improve our products   
  - Learn about the business and engineering practices   
  - Incrementally increased the quality and reliability of our payment processing system   
   About You  - Excellent written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills, able to effectively collaborate with technical and business partners   
  - Have the ability to learn quickly   
  - Enjoy working independently and as part of a team   
  - Possess the ability to solve real-time technology problems   
  - Are a self-starter and possess strong sense of self-motivation   
  - Are selfless. Ideas don't have to originate from you in order for you to commit to a path forward   
  - Value ownership and autonomy   
  - Fluency in at least one non-Bash programming language such as Python, Ruby, Go, JavaScript / Node.js, Java, C#, or C/C   
  - Experience with (or a willingness to learn) at least one major front end development framework React, Vue, Angular)   
  - Experience with at least one cloud platform such as AWS, Azure, or GCP   
   Bonus Points  - Experience with CloudFormation or Terraform   
  - Familiarity with at least one CI / CD tool such as Harness, GitHub Actions, Spinnaker, Jenkins, or CircleCI   
  - Experience with at least one log/metrics/alerting tools such as DataDog, Sumologic, FluentD, Prometheus, ELK, or Splunk   
  - Experience with DynamoDB, Security Scanning Tools, AWS Multi-Region configuration, Snowflake   
   Our Tech StackExperience with some of these would be helpful. We'll teach you the rest!  - AWS Lambda | DynamoDB | ECS | Docker | SQS | CloudFormation JavaScript | Python   
  - Vue.js   
  - Snowflake   
   BenefitsHealth insurance with 100% premium covered for employee Flexible/Untracked PTO / sick leaveChild care and health FSAPaid parental leave401K&nbsp;Interested candidate please send your latest resume at sarath@mindsource.com
